backend/main.mo: Defines transaction types, data models, balance tracking, user access control, and stateful maps for managing financial transactions and user profiles in a Motoko canister.
feature_evidence.json: Provides structured evidence mapping required features to relevant frontend files, components, and test IDs for monthly transaction enhancements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries describing responsibilities and behaviors of various frontend files across the application.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that sets up the root div and loads the main React application module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Handles PIN authentication flow, initializes app state, clears cache on logout, and conditionally renders either auth screens or the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/BackupRestore.ts: Implements JSON backup and restore functionality with UI feedback, file validation, and collapsible sections for backup and restore actions.
frontend/src/components/BalanceCards.tsx: Displays financial overview cards with balances, cumulative stats, loading/error states, and click navigation to add transactions.
frontend/src/components/DailyTracking.ts: Placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/DaywiseTransacti: Displays transactions for a selected day, allows editing daily deductions, and filters transactions by date with local storage support.
frontend/src/components/EditTransactionD: Modal dialog for editing a transaction’s type, amount, description, and date, submitting updates via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/FilterTransactio: Provides date‑range filtering of transactions, computes summary stats, and reacts to cache updates while loading data from local storage.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar offering backup, restore, data reset, and logout controls for authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyTransacti: Filters and displays monthly transactions or derived rows by type with search and month selection.
frontend/src/components/OpeningBalancesF: Form component to create or update opening balances, loading existing data, handling date conversion, and submitting mutations.
frontend/src/components/PinAuth.tsx: Handles PIN setup, confirmation, verification, and reset with state transitions and error handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting the user for their name and saving the profile via a mutation.
Form to create a transaction, supporting preselected types, date picking, validation, and submitting mutations.
frontend/src/components/TransactionHisto: Displays all transactions with filtering, editing, deleting, and merging derived rows for display.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and stored identity restoration using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePinAuth.ts: Provides a PIN-based auth hook handling setup, verification, session restore, and reset using local and session storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks and local‑storage helpers for transactions, balances, profiles, deductions, savings, and opening balances.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind theme variables and styles, including gradients, visibility overrides, animations, and calendar UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the main dashboard with tabbed navigation for overview, adding transactions, history, filtering, and date-based views.
frontend/src/utils/derivedTransactions.t: Generates and merges derived transaction rows like savings and deductions using local storage data and date normalization.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from session or URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, container settings, border radius, keyframes, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, existing features, new feature requests, and tracking info for project state.
